messages.zh: 躺下吧你！整合运动的家伙！
整合运动小队，确认全灭。

messages.en: ……That was……amazing. Such seasoned commanding, without a single flaw……

messages.zh: 抱歉，看来我必须打断你们这场叙旧了。
messages.en: Sorry, it seems that I have to interrupt your reunion.

messages.zh: 一个人冲进核心区，万一有什么变故，后果不堪设想。
messages.en: Rushing into the core zone by yourself, if anything happens, the result is unthinkable.

messages.zh: 下次别这样了。我知道你是在担心任务目标——
messages.en: Don't do it again. I know you’re anxious about the mission target——

messages.zh: 当然，现在的重点不是这个。
messages.en: Of course, that’s not the point now.

messages.zh: 没错。我们刚刚击退了一波袭击。
messages.en: That’s right. We just fended off a wave of attack.

messages.zh: 看来，刚才你们也和整合运动发生了冲突。
messages.en: It seems, that you’ve just had a fight with them as well.

messages.zh: 这个感染者激进组织的成员，刚刚对我们留在核心区外围的小队发动了突然袭击。
messages.en: Members of this radical Infected organization, just attacked our squadrons on the outskirts of the core zone.

messages.zh: 虽然我们解决了那些敌人，但这些家伙的目的，我们并不清楚。
messages.en: Although we took care of the enemies, we’re not sure of their purpose.

messages.zh: 现在我必须去侦查敌人的分布了，你们慢慢撤出核心区。
messages.en: Now I must go investigate the enemies’ distributions. You guys slowly move out of the core zone.

messages.zh: 为什么会攻击我们......？罗德岛明明也是为感染者奔走的组织......
messages.en: Why did they attack us……? Rhodes Island is an organization fighting for the Infected as well……

messages.zh: 先离开这里吧......我觉得这里有点怪......
messages.en: Let’s get out of here first……I think this place is weird……

messages.zh: 没错。核心区的这个石棺，令人不寒而栗。
messages.en: That’s right. This confinement in the core zone, makes people shudder.

messages.zh: 是......来自罗德岛的紧急通讯！
messages.en: It’s……an emergency communication from Rhodes Island!
Sorry to tell you, you are wrong.

messages.zh: 罗德岛终端服务......PRTS,出了什么事吗？
messages.en: Primitive Rhodesisland Terminal Service……PRTS, is there anything wrong?

messages.zh: 应急神经连接请求被意外触发了。
messages.en: The emergency neural connection request was activated unexpectedly.

messages.zh: 如果打扰到了您的派对，万分抱歉。我将在稍后断开连接。
messages.en: If Iinterrupted your party, I’m sorry for that, and will disconnect shortly.

messages.zh: 不！别......正好我需要你帮个忙！
messages.en: Don’t! wait……I need your help now!

messages.zh: 博士，时间很紧张，我现在为你重新连接至罗德岛的后勤系统。
messages.en: Doctor, we don’t have much time, I’ll reconnect you to Rhodes Island’s management system.

messages.zh: 在我们作战的时候，希望你能利用它，帮助我们取得优势。
messages.en: When we’re in battle, I want you to use it to help us gain advantage.

messages.zh: 需要确认管理员身份，请选择识别方式。
messages.en: Requires administrator authentication, please choose a verification method.

messages.zh: 虽然不知道为什么你不说话，反而触碰了一下屏幕中央——
messages.en: I don’t know why you didn’t speak, but touched the center of the screen instead……

messages.zh: ——不过我已经找到相匹配的指纹。
messages.en: ——but I have found the matching fingerprint.
